EmailTemplate.description: Send email when Complaint Case opend
EmailTemplate.name: Complaint Case Open Email Temp
EmailTemplate.subject: Idaho Central Follow-up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello{!Case.BLANKVALUE(MID( ContactId , FIND(" ", ContactId ), LEN(ContactId ) ), LEFT( ContactId ,FIND(" ", ContactId ))) } ,
Great news! The promotion on your new account has been applied. Your account will reflect your new balance immediately in eBranch <link to eBranch>.
We appreciate your membership with Idaho Central Credit Union.
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
Idaho Central Credit Union P.O. Box 2469 Pocatello, ID 83206 d: (208) 239-3000 | f: (208) 239-3055
